As a retired military veteran and law enforcement officer I have seen even "professionals" have a brain freeze and put the wrong ammo or mag in the firearm with devastating results. Don't be that guy everyone else talks about. Buy these bands and prevent a range disaster.

The god thing about the 300 AAC Blackout is its compatibility with 223/5.56 components. The lower receiver bolts, and magazines are all interchangeable. The bad thing is the 300 AAC Blackout round can chamber in your 5.56 weapon system with catastrophic results. 

Embossed on both sides. Color filled indented lettering so you can feel the difference even in low light conditions.

title: For Sale:  Glock 21 Gen 3 (Upgrades and Low Round Count!)
postcontent: This 2012 Glock 21 has a 3.5lb ghost connector installed. The connector does not lower the pull to 3.5 lbs, but did lower it about a pound and, more importantly, really smoothed out the trigger pull. I do have the original factory connector and will include it in the Glock case should a buyer want to return the trigger to factory spec. I also had metal Ameriglo I-Dot Pro sights professionally installed. They are a vast improvement over the plastic stock sights. The front dog is bright orange in the day and uses trijicon tritium to glow bright in low light/the dark. I also have four 13 round Glock magazines I'll include with the pistol. I've put less than 500 rounds through the pistol, so it's got all most all of its life left. This is an honest round count... there isn't really any visible barrel finish wear. I've never had a single malfunction of any kind... it's a Glock. Sadly, I'm forced to downsize my collection and I've decided to eliminate the .45s. Email me with any questions. I have over $750 into this pistol, so this should be a great deal for someone.

title: For Sale:  BNIB Burris XTR Scope 1x-4x-24mm Illuminated w/PEPR mount #201904
postcontent:
Hello,

Up for sale is a brand new Burris XTR Scope w/ PEPR mount. This has never been used, mounted, or taken outside. I am the original purchaser and it has not been registered so you will be on record as the original owner. I also have the same model with the FASTFIRE 3 RED DOT for $700 w/ protective polymer shield & deluxe neoprene waterproof soft cover (model #201905).  I DO NOT/WILL NOT trade anything for this (please don’t ask). Only serious inquiries and please don’t ask/haggle about price, this is listed well below the suggested retail. If you can find it elsewhere in stock cheaper, congratulations and best of luck. If you have any questions, need more pictures, or are interested in buying, contact Jason REDACTED or email me REDACTED. I work evenings so I likely won’t respond until after noon. I can arrange for payment by credit card if you cover the upcharge (small percentage rate for transaction) or via paypal. I will ship this for free through USPS and it will be to you within 3 business days after shipping with confirmed tracking number. Text or calling will provide the quickest response. Thanks for your interest & God Bless!

Burris has gone to extremes to engineer the ultimate in high-performance optics - the BURRIS Xtreme Tactical 1-4x24 Riflescope, Illuminated XTR Ballistic 5.56 Reticle, Gen2, 30mm (201904). Extra-large, ultra-premium lenses produce unsurpassed resolution, clarity, and brightness. The propietary HiLume ultra-clear, index-matched multi-coating used on the Burris XTR riflescope has been enhanced with new StormCoat. The ultra-low-surface tension coating causes water to form into tighter beads and slide off the glass, leaving more clean surface through which to clearly see your target. The enhancement is exclusive to XTR scopes. Another simple yet highly effective Burris innovation - the lighted reticle scope. Any hunter who has tried to settle standard black crosshairs on a black bear or wild boar, or attempted to put the hammer down on a buck right at dusk recognizes the necessity for a lighted reticle. This model riflescope features the innovative XTR Ballistic 5.56 reticle, which is developed for competitive shooters, law enforcement, and military applications. The lighted circular donut in the center provides ultra fast engagement at close distances. The center dots and lower leg of the reticle provides trajectory compensation for the 5.56 62grain FMJ cartridge out to 1000 yards yet is very accurate with a number of other loadings out to 600 or 700 yards. The left, right, and upper reticle posts feature precise bars for milling target sizes and distances. A true 1x optic, 30mm XTR Rings and a P.E.P.R. mount is ideal for modern sporting rifles. It covers the tactical bases from entry work to long-range counter-sniper duties. The XTR scope tubes are 30mm, resulting in 25% thicker main tubes and 42% more strength. Double-force coil spring suspension locks the inner tube in place for unfailing accuracy. The whole package is waterproof, fogproof, shockproof and warranted forever. Tactical scopes just don't come any better. Features 30mm main tube that is 25% thicker in cross section, resulting in 42% more strength Integrated eyepiece and power ring with deep relief grooves for maximum durability and ease of changing magnification Extra large internal lenses for maximum brightness Ultra-premium quality lenses for outstanding resolution and clarity Double-force coil spring suspension system for the ultimate in accuracy HiLume StormCoat lens finish to reduce surface tension and increase water shedding 30mm XTR Rings P.E.P.R. mount Waterproof, fogproof, shockproof Illuminated XTR Ballistic 5.56 Reticle Matte Black Finish Burris Forever Warranty

title: For Sale:  Sig R556 rifle 5.56
postcontent: Utilizing the time-tested rotating bolt and adjustable gas piston operating system, the SIG556xi allows operators a choice of caliber, barrel length, handguard/stock configurations and lower receivers. A removable barrel allows the operator to select the necessary length for a given mission. Adding the appropriate bolt, the SIG556xi can be changed to any of three calibers, 5.56x45mm NATO, 300 Blackout, and 7.62x39mm NATO. Users can also quickly change out the non-serialized lower receiver, allowing the use of either AR-style STANAG magazines or rock-and-lock AK-style magazines. The SIG556xi upper receiver is the serialized part, making the lower an easy to purchase part. Polymer handguards accept all Magpul® light and rail kits, while the aluminum and carbon fiber handguards accept 2”, 4”, and 6” M1913 rails. Barrels are available in 10”, 14.5”, and 16”. Truly ambidextrous, the SIG556xi features an ambi safety selector, magazine release and user swappable charging handle (right- or left-handed).

title: For Sale:  RARE-FN HERSTAL- FNP9 (Military/Police hybrid)
postcontent:
Due to lame offers, I'm re-posting with my firm price of $750

These pistols are made at 2 FN facilities. European market guns are produced at a home factory in Herstal, Belgium
 US market guns at an FN plant in Columbia, SC

 The law enforcement/military version was marketed by FN as the FNP-9 and was all black with black furniture and barrel.
 The civilian version was marketed by Browning as a PRO-9 and was black with a stainless slide as well as stainless furniture.
 Frames on both were black polymer. The Pro-9 had the browning buckmark logo, and the FNP-9 has the FN.

 This is an extremely rare mix of the 2 designs that Browning & FN Herstal did together and also marketed together as well. The frame marked with FN and the slide is marked as an FNP-9. It is NOT a pieced together weapon as only a limited handful were manufactured like this 
 (All black with stainless furniture and barrel)
 First announced in 2003 it features a DA/SA operation with decocker.

 CONDITION:
 Gun is in VERY nice condition and has had less than 100 rounds through it. Has a couple of VERY MINOR holster wear spots on the slide but that is really about it. Otherwise looks great as you can see in the pictures. For the most part was a safe queen and I carried it for a short time.

 This is a beautiful gun with an extremely smooth pull and I can honestly say I have never held a more comfortable firearm in my hand. Many enthusiasts compare them to the feeling of these to the 1911. (If you are into that)

 INCLUDES:
 Holster, 1 box (60rds) of 9mm ammo, 2 mags.

 $750 FIRM!!!!!

 Serious inquiries please email with questions, although I would prefer serious buyers.
 Thank you

THE UT-15 TACTICAL CARBINE

 Wilson Combat’s® UT-15 Urban Tactical model is an ideal all-around tactical or sporting semi-auto carbine. It offers precise accuracy and fast handling versatility in a lightweight package, with our famous unequalled quality, relentless reliability, and superior service. We start with precision CNC machined upper and lower receivers, using high-quality 7075 T6 aluminum forgings. The upper utilizes a flat-top receiver and a 16.25” free-floated, fluted, match grade barrel. Uppers and lowers are hand-matched by a master riflesmith.

 The UT-15 features a precision Tactical Trigger Unit, tuned to a crisp 4 pound trigger pull, facilitating the inherent accuracy potential of this carbine. A master riflesmith then carefully assembles and fits the rifle with what we consider the finest barrel in the industry. The result is a tactical rifle that you can stake your life on; one guaranteed to shoot 1 MOA at 100 yards with quality ammunition.

 The same qualities that have made the UT-15 Urban Tactical rifle a favorite defensive weapon also make it an outstanding choice for a sporting rifle. Light weight, compact size, dependable performance in all weather conditions – plus extreme accuracy – assure excellence in the field. Whether you are a target shooter, varmint hunter, or even a weekend plinker, our UT-15 is a superb choice you will enjoy in the field.

 Some standard features of the Wilson Combat® UT-15 Tactical include: 

·       Flat-top upper and lower receiver CNC machined from quality US made  aluminum forgings

·       Premium 16.25” Wilson Combat® match-grade fluted barrel

·       Free-float ventilated aluminum handguard

·       TTU - Tactical Trigger Unit - Single Stage, 4 lb.

·       Six position Mil-Spec collapsible stock

 One of the most popular options is a quad-rail handguard featuring full length integral Picatinny rails for mounting virtually any accessory you can imagine. Common accessories the quad rail will accept include bi-pod, weapons light, laser sights, red-dot sights, vertical handguards, etc. The quad-rail also allows mounting the barrel so it is free-floated for maximum accuracy and is ventilated for improved barrel cooling. Our quad-rail is fully machined from air-craft grade aluminum and hard coat anodized to a matte black finish.

title: For Sale:  Ruger 77 Mk 2 Frontier Scout
postcontent:
This was the predecessor to the Ruger Gunsight Scout--a first attempt to incorporate the design concepts of Col. Cooper into a .308 rifle. Features include a short, highly maneuverable  stock and barrel combination that makes this .308 bolt gun as handy as a lever-action 30-30.

Ruger's M77 MKII Frontier Rifle won the Guns & Ammo Magazine Reader Poll as "The 2005 Gun of the Year"

It has a 16.5" barrel and a far-forward scope mount so you can use a long eye-relief scope. Cooper's idea was that this allowed for faster acquisition since the shooter could keep both eyes open while picking up the target in the scope. 

This gun has had fewer than 50 rounds through it.

title: For Sale:  DPM AR-10 or LR-308
postcontent:
Excellent condition DPMS LR-308 AKA AR-10 in 308 Winchester. Comes with:
- five Factory 20-round mags (about $25 eaqch these days)
- Hogue rubber over molded grip
- free floating barrel, 1x10 twist 16-inch barrel, 
- flash suppressor and the  liberal-dreaded  BAYONET LUG, heaven help us
- Viking rubber butt pad over DPMS collapsible stock
- Chromed bolt carrier.
- Simple nylon web sling
- Mounted Centerpoint -4x16x 40 lighted reticle scope. Dual mounts with enough clearance to clear front ramp sight

The barrel is stamped  "308" not "7.62x51", which DOES make a difference.  Factory 308 ammo loads/ejects fine, but any reloaded ammo will have to be made using small base dies, patience and some dedication. The chamber is finicky as any out-of-spec overall length (reloads, not factory ammo) will cause feed/lockup problems. DPMS really prides themselves with what they call "match-grade" chamber dimensions.

I am the second owner, so the gun has been handled, has been in the woods as well. If you're looking for a museum piece, move on. This gun has been shot, carried and can be accurately called "USED", but in excellent condition.

Looking for cash sale to fund my next acquisition. Unless you have a POF in 308, I'm not interested in any trades I can think of. Price is firm

Federal American Eagle Suppressor Ammunition was designed from the ground up to provide the ultimate in reliability and cleanliness in suppressed firearms. Subsonic loads are ideal for shooting through suppressors because they help reduce the sound signature even more. postcontent:
At Aegis Tactical you will earn your Florida Concealed Weapons Firearms License Class CWL. (Also Know As: CCW, CWP, Gun Permit). As with all of our Firearms Training Courses, this course exceeds the requirements for you to obtain your Florida Concealed Weapons/Firearms License. With Florida’s  Concealed Carry Law to legally conceal carry a gun you need a license, and to obtain that license you must attend a certified firearms training course.

Why take our course? You will learn firearm safety, the law, and your rights regarding carrying a firearm and defending yourself in a worst case scenario, and perhaps more importantly, you will be able to prove in court that you received this instruction. All of our instructors have proven real life experience and are retired Law Enforcement Officers with a vast knowledge of various weapon systems as well as extensive experience in training. Stop in today to meet our instructor and see our experience. All instructors are State and NRA certified.

Days & Times:

Tuesday & Thursday at 6:00pm

Saturdays at 9:00am

Sunday at 12:00pm

Instructors available 7 days a week. Please call if you do not see a class time that fits your schedule.

If you have limited or no experience with a handgun please take our “Basics” class.

Aegis Tactical is conveniently located in Lakewood Ranch Florida just minutes from the Sarasota, Bradenton area.
